anya-e0201n5:2_1: saṅkhyābhedadīpakaṁ liṅgabhedarahitaṁ kriyāpadhānavācakaṁ tyādyantanāmakaṁ ākhyātapadaṁ dīpiyate.
anya-e0201n5:3_0: Tattha kriyaṁ dhāretīti dhātu. Sā pakatidhātu, vikatidhātu, nāmadhātuvasena tividhā.
anya-e0201n5:4_0: Tattha bhū, hū, gamu, paca iccādi pakatidhātu nāma sabhāvena siddhattā.
anya-e0201n5:5_0: Titikkha, tikiccha, bubhukkha, jighacchaiccādi vikatidhātu nāma saṅkhatavasena siddhattā.
anya-e0201n5:6_1: pabbatāya iccādi nāmadhātu nāma nāmabhūtassa sato kriyavācīpaccayayogena dhātuṭṭhāne ṭhitattā.
anya-e0201n5:8_0: Tatthayā dhātu kammāpekkhaṁ kriyaṁ vadati, sā sakammikā nāma. Gāmaṁ gacchati, odanaṁ pacati iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:9_0: Yā kammanirapekkhaṁ kriyaṁ vadati, sā akammikā nāma. Bhavati, hoti, tiṭṭhati, seti iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:11_0: Tattha yā ekakammāpekkhaṁ kriyaṁ vadati, sā ekakammikā nāma. Gāmaṁ gacchati, odanaṁ pacati iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:12_0: Yā padhānā’padhānavasena kammadvayāpekkhaṁ kriyaṁ vadati, sā dvikammikā nāma.
anya-e0201n5:16_6: anekatthattā pana dhātūnaṁ atthantaravacane vā nānupasaggayoge vā akammikāpi sakammikā honti,
anya-e0201n5:21_0: Vida – anubhavane, sukhaṁ vedeti, vipākaṁ paṭisaṁvedeti ma. ni. 3.303.
anya-e0201n5:22_1: vedayāmahaṁ bhante vedayatīti maṁ dhāretu cūḷava. aṭṭha. 102,
anya-e0201n5:25_0: Padānaṁ byañjanasampattiyā vā atthasampattiyā vā upakārakā vibhatti, paccayā paccayā nāma.
anya-e0201n5:26_0: Tattha vibhattiyo tyādi, tvādiiccādinā aṭṭhavidhā bhavanti, sarūpato channavutividhā.
anya-e0201n5:28_0: Tattha parahitapaṭisaṁyuttesu ṭhānesu pavattibahulāni padāni parassapadāni nāma.
anya-e0201n5:30_3: Sādhakaṭṭhena tehi parabhūto kattā paro nāmāti apare.
anya-e0201n5:31_3: parachakkāni pana rūḷhīvasena attanopadāni nāmātipi vadanti.
anya-e0201n5:31_4: Idaṁ na yujjati parachakkesu tabbahulamattassāpi asiddhattā.
anya-e0201n5:31_5: Pāḷibhāsaṁ pana patvā dvinnaṁ chakkānaṁ attahita,
anya-e0201n5:31_6: parahitesu vā tīsu kārakesu vā pavattinānāttaṁ na dissatiyeva,
anya-e0201n5:31_7: tasmā imasmiṁ ganthe taṁ nāmadvayaṁ na gahitanti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0201n5:32_0: Paccayā pana catubbidhā vikaraṇa, kicca, kārita, dhātupaccayavasena.
anya-e0201n5:33_0: Tattha ye dhātusiddhāni tyādipadāni tabbādipadāni ca gaṇavibhāgavasena aññamaññaṁ visadisarūpāni karonti,
anya-e0201n5:35_0: Paresaṁ āṇāpanasaṅkhāte payojakabyāpāre pavattā ṇi, ṇāpipaccayā kāritapaccayā nāma.
anya-e0201n5:36_0: Visuṁ taṁtaṁkriyavācībhāvena dhāturūpā kha, cha, saiccādikā paccayā dhātupaccayā nāma.
anya-e0201n5:38_0: Tattha hiyyattanī, ajjattanī ajjatanī (bahūsu), parokkhāti imā tisso vibhattiyo atīte kāle vattanti.
anya-e0201n5:43_0: Athopi viharissanti, esā buddhāna dhammatā’’ti a. ni. 4.21 ca –
anya-e0201n5:44_5: Pacchā pana garuno vatticchāvasena vibhattīnaṁ nānākamaṁ karonti.
anya-e0201n5:46_0: Tesu sādhyabhāvo nānādhātūnaṁ vasena nānāvidho hoti.
anya-e0201n5:46_1: Sādhanabhāvo nānādhātvatthānaṁ pavattākārasaṅkhātena ekaṭṭhena ekova hoti.
anya-e0201n5:46_2: So pana yathā jāti nāma anuppannapakkhe ṭhite saṅkhatadhamme uppādentī viya khāyati,
anya-e0201n5:46_3: tathā vohāravisayamatte ṭhite sabbadhātvatthe pātubhonte karonto viya khāyati,
anya-e0201n5:46_4: tasmā so sādhananti ca kārakanti ca vuccati.
anya-e0201n5:46_5: Yathā ca jātivasena uppannā saṅkhatadhammā ‘‘cintanaṁ jātaṁ,
anya-e0201n5:46_6: phusanaṁ jāta’’ miccādinā ekantameva jātiṁ visesenti,
anya-e0201n5:46_7: tathā paccayatthavasena pātubhontā nānādhātvatthāpi ‘‘bhuyyate, gamyate, paccate, bhavanaṁ, gamanaṁ,
anya-e0201n5:46_11: Idha pana dvīsu bhāvesu sādhanabhāvo adhippetoti.
anya-e0201n5:47_2: ‘Puriso’ti ca ‘‘yaṁkiñcāyaṁ purisapuggalo paṭisaṁvedeti sukhaṁ vā dukkhaṁ vā adukkhamasukhaṁ vā’’ti ma. ni.
anya-e0201n5:48_3: Tattha attano ajjhattasantānabhūtattā amhattho uttamapuriso nāma,
anya-e0201n5:48_7: Idañca nāmaṁ kārakabhede antogadhamevāti katvā imasmiṁ ganthe na gahitanti.
anya-e0201n5:50_2: kulaṁ gacchati’’ iccādīsu ‘puriso’iccādīnaṁ abhidheyyapadānaṁ liṅgānugato rūpabhedo ākhyātapade natthi.
anya-e0201n5:51_1: na nāmapadaṁ viya dabbaṁ padhānato abhidhātīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0201n5:57_0: 562.Vattamānetianti si tha mi ma te ante se vhe e mheka. 414; rū. 428; nī. 872; caṁ. 1.2.82; pā. 3.2.123.
anya-e0201n5:58_0: Ārabhitvā niṭṭhaṁ anupagato bhāvo vattamāno nāma,

anya-e0201n5:58_3: Ayañca vibhatti tyādīti ca vattamānakālavisayattā vattamānāti ca sijjhati.

anya-e0201n5:60_2: tadubhayato sesanāmanti tīsu nāmesu payujjamānesu vā gamyamānesu vā ekasmiṁ vā anekesu vā atthesu pubbachakka,
anya-e0201n5:61_0: Ettha ca vibhattividhānamukhena taṁtaṁsaññāvidhānampi siddhaṁ hoti.
anya-e0201n5:62_0: Kathaṁ?Ti, anti, si, tha, mi, ma iti pubbachakkaṁ nāma.
anya-e0201n5:63_0: Te, ante, se, vhe, e, mhe iti parachakkaṁ nāma.
anya-e0201n5:65_0: Tattha tulyādhikaraṇabhūte sesanāme payujjamāne vā gamyamāne vā paṭhamadukaṁ bhavati.
anya-e0201n5:65_3: Dukesu ca ekasmiṁ atthe vattabbe ekavacanaṁ,
anya-e0201n5:66_3: so nāmattho tyādivācakānaṁ eva vāccabhūto vuttattho nāma hoti,
anya-e0201n5:67_1: kammādhiṭṭhānassa ca liṅgatthassa vācakaṁ nāmapadaṁ abhidheyyapadaṁ nāma,
anya-e0201n5:68_0: Amādayo ca atthavācakavibhattiyo etasmiṁ okāsaṁ na labhanti,
anya-e0201n5:68_2: Evarūpāni tulyādhikaraṇabhūtāni abhidheyyapadāni sandhāya sutte ‘tumhamhasesesū’ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0201n5:69_1: sesanāmehi yuttavākye ca missakehi yuttavākye cāti dvīsu dvīsu vākyesu veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0201n5:70_0: Tattha suddhehi yutte paccekaṁ dukāni vattanti. Yathā?
anya-e0201n5:72_0: Missakehi yutte dvandavākye pana ‘vippaṭisedhe’ti saṅketattā paradukāni eva okāsaṁ labhanti,
anya-e0201n5:73_3: te ca tumhe ca mayañca gacchāma.
anya-e0201n5:75_3: te ca tumhe ca ahañca gacchāma.
anya-e0201n5:76_0: Api ca tvañca so ca gacchatha,
anya-e0201n5:76_6: ahañca te ca gacchāmaiccādīnipi catukkāni veditabbāni.
anya-e0201n5:78_0: Ahañca dāni āyasmā ca sāriputto bhikkhusaṅghaṁ pariharissāma ma. ni. 2.160.
anya-e0201n5:79_0: Ahañca ime ca bhikkhū samādhinā nisīdimhā.
anya-e0201n5:80_0: Ahañca bhariyā ca dānapatī ahumhā jā. 2.22.1593.
anya-e0201n5:81_0: Ahañca sāmiko ca dānapatī ahumhā jā. 2.22.1617 iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:82_1: tvañca gacchasī’’ti vattabbe ‘‘tumhe gacchathā’’ti vā ‘‘so ca gacchati,
anya-e0201n5:82_2: ahañca gacchāmī’’ti vattabbe ‘‘mayaṁ gacchāmā’’ti vā vacanaṁ,
anya-e0201n5:83_3: tatthapi sabbesaṁ dvinnaṁ vā tiṇṇaṁ vā missakabhūtānaṁ nāma,
anya-e0201n5:83_4: tumha’mhānaṁ ekato abhidhāne missakadvandavākye paro puriso yojetabboti attho na na sambhavatīti.
anya-e0201n5:85_1: tyādīsu paresu kriyatthā paraṁ kattari lānubandho apaccayo hoti.
anya-e0201n5:86_2: tattha ayaṁ lapaccayoti lapaccayena tesaṁ kattuvācakabhāvaṁ ñāpeti,
anya-e0201n5:87_0: Ettha ca vikaraṇapaccayā nāma byañjanapūraṇā eva honti,
anya-e0201n5:87_2: tasmā yasmiṁ payoge tehi vinā padarūpaṁ na sijjhati,
anya-e0201n5:87_6: ayampi lapaccayo dhātuto paraṁ vibhattisare vā āgamasare vā asante vattati,
anya-e0201n5:87_7: sante pana ‘‘pacāmi, pacāma, pacāhi, gameti, gamenti, vajjeti,
anya-e0201n5:89_1: paccayā paccayo nāma. I, kī, khi, ci,
anya-e0201n5:89_2: ji iccādayo ivaṇṇā nāma. Cu, ju, bhū,
anya-e0201n5:89_4: Paccaye pare ekakkharadhātvantānaṁ ivaṇṇu’vaṇṇānaṁ kamena e,
anya-e0201n5:90_0: Saṁpubbo-sambhoti , sambhonti, sambhosi, sambhotha, sambhomi, sambhoma.
anya-e0201n5:92_0: Tattha yathā ‘‘nīlo paṭo’’ti ettha nīlasaddassa attho duvidho vāccattho, abhidheyyatthoti.
anya-e0201n5:95_2: tasmā ‘‘paṭo’’ iti padantarena nīlasaddassa abhidheyyattho ācikkhīyati.
anya-e0201n5:96_0: Tathā ‘‘anubhotī’’ti ettha tisaddassa attho duvidho vāccattho, abhidheyyatthoti.
anya-e0201n5:99_4: Tasmā ‘‘so’’ iti padantarena tisaddassa abhidheyyattho ācikkhīyati,
anya-e0201n5:99_5: vāccatthassa pana tisaddeneva ujuṁ vuttattā tatiyāvibhattiyā puna ācikkhitabbakiccaṁ natthi,
anya-e0201n5:101_0: Sare pare e, onaṁ kamena aya, avā honti. Ya, vesu a-kāro uccāraṇattho.
anya-e0201n5:104_0: Hi, mi, mesu paresu a-kārassa dīgho hoti.
anya-e0201n5:106_0: Parachakke – bhavate, bhavante, bhavase, bhavavhe, bhave, bhavamhe.
anya-e0201n5:108_0: Adhyā’bhi, paripubbo hiṁsāyaṁ, adhibhavati, abhibhavati, paribhavati.
anya-e0201n5:109_0: Vipubbo vināse, pākaṭe, sobhaṇe ca, vibhavati.
anya-e0201n5:111_0: Abhi, saṁpubbo pattiyaṁ, ajjhogāhe ca, abhisambhavati, tathā pātubbhavati, āvibhavati iccādi.

anya-e0201n5:123_2: ‘‘Anubhūyatī’’ti suṇanto sādhyakriyāsahitaṁ kammasattiṁ eva ujuṁ jānāti,
anya-e0201n5:126_0: Garupubbamhā rassato nte, ntīnaṁ reādeso hoti.

anya-e0201n5:132_7: dabbasseva ca tassa abyattasarūpattā saṅkhyābhedopi natthi,
anya-e0201n5:133_0: Tena bhogaṁ anubhūyati, anubhuyyati, anubhūyate, anubhuyyate, anubhavanaṁ hotīti attho.
anya-e0201n5:137_1: tassa payojakassa kattuno byāpāre kriyatthā ṇi ca ṇāpi ca honti.
anya-e0201n5:138_0: Tesu ca ākārantato ‘ato’ (moga.) ṇāpiyeva hoti, dāpeti, dāpayati.
anya-e0201n5:140_0: Sesato dvepi, pāceti, pācayati, pācāpeti, pācāpayati.

anya-e0201n5:147_0: Jhe-cintāyaṁ, jhāyati, jhāyanti, ujjhāyati, nijjhāyati iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:149_0: Ṇi , ṇāpi, āpīhi ca kattari lo hoti vā.
anya-e0201n5:151_0: Iminā asare ṭhāne ayādesato paraṁ akāro hoti,
anya-e0201n5:156_0: Kriyatthā parassa kyassa ādimhi īña hoti.
anya-e0201n5:163_0: Ekakammā dvikammā ca, dvikammā ca tikammakā.
anya-e0201n5:165_0: Katturūpena cettha kammakatturūpampi saṅgayhati. Kusūlo bhijjati, bhijjanadhammo bhijjati.
anya-e0201n5:166_1: Tattha yaṁ padaṁ kattuvācakaṁ samānaṁ saddarūpena kammarūpaṁ bhavati,
anya-e0201n5:168_0: Tathā so pahīyethāpi nopi pahīyetha saṁ. ni. 1.249,

anya-e0201n5:169_2: kattari eva yujjati kammani ivaṇṇāgamassa sabbhāvā.

anya-e0201n5:170_0: Ettha ca vattamānaṁ catubbidhaṁ niccapavattaṁ, pavattāvirataṁ, pavattuparataṁ, samīpavattamānanti.

anya-e0201n5:174_5: tāva viramaṇakriyā vattamānā eva nāma hoti.
anya-e0201n5:175_1: kuto nu tvaṁ āgacchasi saṁ. ni. 1.130,

anya-e0201n5:179_1: bhāsati vā karoti vā dha. pa.

anya-e0201n5:206_3: etha bhikkhave sīlavā hotha’’ iccādīsupi ehi,

anya-e0201n5:225_0: Aññamaññasambandhiniyā hetukriyāyañca phalakriyāyañca kriyatthā eyyādayo honti vā.

anya-e0201n5:229_0: Pañhe-kinnu kho tvaṁ vinayaṁ vā adhiyyeyyāsi dhammaṁ vā.
anya-e0201n5:231_0: Vidhimhi-pāṇaṁ na haneyya, adinnaṁ na ādiyeyya, dānaṁ dadeyya, sīlaṁ rakkheyya.

anya-e0201n5:1384_0: Kamu-icchāyaṁ, kāmeti, kāmayati, kāmenti, kāmayanti, nikāmeti, nikāmayati, nikāmenti, nikāmayanti.
anya-e0201n5:1388_0: Gaṇa-saṅkhyāne, gaṇa, ghaṭānaṁ tudādittā na vuddhi, gaṇeti, gaṇayati.
anya-e0201n5:1390_0: Cinta-cintāyaṁ, garupantattā na vuddhi, cinteti, cintayati.
anya-e0201n5:1394_0: Īādimhi-cintesi, cintayi, cinteyuṁ, cintayuṁ, cintesi, cintayi,
anya-e0201n5:1399_0: Pūja-pūjāyaṁ, garupantattā na vuddhi, pūjeti, pūjayati, pūjenti, pūjayanti.
anya-e0201n5:1404_0: Māna-pūjāyaṁ, māneti, mānayati, mānenti, mānayanti iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:1413_0: 693.Tijamānehi khasā khamāvīmaṁsāsuka. 433; rū. 528; nī. 906-9; caṁ. 1.1.17, 28; pā. 3.1.5.
anya-e0201n5:1414_0: Khamāyaṁ vīmaṁsāyañca pavattehi tija, mānadhātūhi paraṁ kamena kha, sapaccayā honti.
anya-e0201n5:1417_1: sapaccayantānaṁ dhāturūpānaṁ paṭhamaṁ saddarūpaṁ ekassaraṁ dverūpaṁ hotīti ‘tija,
anya-e0201n5:1417_2: tija’iti dvirūpe kate ‘loponādibyañjanassā’ti anādibyañjanabhūtassa ja-kārassa lopo,
anya-e0201n5:1425_0: Māna-vīmaṁsāyaṁ, tato sapaccayo. ‘Khachasānamekassaraṁ dve’ti ‘māna, māna’iti dvirūpe kate –
anya-e0201n5:1426_0: 695.Mānassa vī parassa ca maṁka. 463-7; rū. 532-3; nī. 944.
anya-e0201n5:1427_0: Dvitte pubbassa mānassa vī hoti, parassa ca sabbassa mānassa maṁ hoti.
anya-e0201n5:1432_0: Vīmaṁsāyanti kiṁ? Māna-pūjāyaṁ, māneti, sammāneti, abhimāneti, pūjetīti attho.
anya-e0201n5:1434_0: 696.Kitā tikicchāsaṁsayesu choka. 433; rū. 528; nī. 906-9; caṁ. 1.1.18; pā. 3.1.5 kā.
anya-e0201n5:1435_0: Tikicchāyaṁ saṁsaye ca pavattakitadhātuto paraṁ cho hoti.
anya-e0201n5:1438_0: Saṁsayamhā aññasmiṁ tikicchatthe pavattassa kitadhātussa dvitte pubbassa kitassati hoti vā.
anya-e0201n5:1439_0: Tikicchati, tikicchanti. Devāpi naṁ tikicchanti, mātāpettibharaṁ naraṁ jā. 2.22.408.
anya-e0201n5:1442_0: Vāsaddena tikārābhāve ‘kavaggahānaṁ cavaggajā’ti dvitte pubbassa cavaggo,
anya-e0201n5:1445_0: Kita-ñāṇe nivāse ca, ketati, saṁketati, niketati.
anya-e0201n5:1447_0: 698.Nindāyaṁ gupabadhā bassa bho caka. 433; rū. 528; caṁ. 1.1.19, 20; pā. 3.1.5, 6 kā.
anya-e0201n5:1450_0: Gupissa dvitte pubbassa u-kārassa i hoti.
anya-e0201n5:1453_0: Kārite-jiguccheti, jigucchayati, jigucchāpeti, jigucchāpayati. Jigucchatu, jigucchantu iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:1457_0: Dvitte pubbassa assa i hoti kha, cha,
anya-e0201n5:1459_0: Nindāyanti kiṁ? Badha-bandhana, hiṁsāsu, bādheti, bādhayati. Vātaṁ jālena bādhesi jā. 1.12.8.
anya-e0201n5:1463_0: 701.Tuṁsmā lopo cicchāyaṁ teka. 434; rū. 534; nī. 910; caṁ. 1.1.22; pā. 3.1.7.
anya-e0201n5:1464_0: Tumantehi icchatthe te kha, cha, sā honti,
anya-e0201n5:1464_2: Idañca suttaṁ tumicchatthasambhave sati sabbadhātupadehipi kha, cha,
anya-e0201n5:1464_6: chānaṁ ādimhi īāgamaṁ katvā ‘‘aputtaṁ puttamiva ācarituṁ icchati puttīyīsati,
anya-e0201n5:1464_7: pabbato viya attānaṁ ācarituṁ icchati pabbatāyīsati,
anya-e0201n5:1465_0: Bhuja, ghasa, hana, ji, hara, pā, su.
anya-e0201n5:1470_0: Dvitte parassa hanassa ghaṁ hoti se pare.
anya-e0201n5:1472_0: Ji-jaye, jetuṁ icchatīti atthe – sapaccayo, dvittaṁ.
anya-e0201n5:1474_0: Ji, harānaṁ dvitte parassa jissa harassa ca gī hoti se pare.
anya-e0201n5:1479_0: Titikkhituṁ icchatīti atthe – titikkhato sapaccayo, sapaccayaparattā puna dvittappasaṅge –
anya-e0201n5:1481_0: Sakiṁ dvitte kate puna dvittaṁ na āpajjatīti puna dvittābhāvo, ‘ū byañjanassā’ti ū āgamo.
anya-e0201n5:1483_0: Iti tumicchatthe kha, cha, sa rāsi.
anya-e0201n5:1487_0: Kammatthā nāmapadamhā icchatthe īyo hotīti kammabhūtā puttasaddato icchāyaṁ īyo,
anya-e0201n5:1491_0: Upamīyati upametabbo attho etenāti upamānaṁ, upamānabhūtā kammapadato ācāratthe īyo hoti.
anya-e0201n5:1496_0: Upamānabhūtā ādhārabhūtā ca nāmamhā ācāratthe īyo hoti.
anya-e0201n5:1497_0: Kuṭīyati, kuṭīyanti pāsāde, nadiyaṁ viya samudde ācarati nadīyati, nadīyanti iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:1498_0: Araññe viya nagare ācarati araññīyati, araññīyanti nagare. Evaṁ gehīyati vihāre.
anya-e0201n5:1499_0: Lokadhammehi akampanīyaṭṭhena pabbato viya attānaṁ ācaratīti atthe –
anya-e0201n5:1501_0: Upamānabhūtā kattubhūtā ca nāmamhā ācāratthe āyo hotīti pabbatasaddato āyo. Tato tyādyuppatti.
anya-e0201n5:1502_2: cicciṭo viya attānaṁ ācarati cicciṭāyati, saddo.
anya-e0201n5:1505_0: Cīpaccayassa attho abbhūtatabbhāvo jhattho nāma. Kattuto jhatthe āyo hoti.
anya-e0201n5:1510_0: Saddādīhi dutiyantehi nāmehi karotyatthe āyo hoti.
anya-e0201n5:1518_0: Dhātvattho vuccati yā kāci kriyā. Nāmasmā dhātvatthe i hoti. ‘Yuvaṇṇānameo paccaye’ti issa ettaṁ.
anya-e0201n5:1526_1: puttīyituṁ icchatīti atthe ‘tuṁsmā lopo cicchāyaṁ te’ti sapaccayo.
anya-e0201n5:1528_3: Syādyantassa yathiṭṭhaṁ ekassaraṁ ādibhūta’maññaṁ vā dverūpaṁ hoti,
